```{r}

library(Seurat)
library(reticulate)
library(arrow)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(SeuratDisk)
obj.opossum.nonneuronal <- LoadH5Seurat("E:/Opossum_M1/seurat/opossum_m1_nonneuronal.h5Seurat")

```


```{r}

obj.list <- SplitObject(obj.opossum.nonneuronal, split.by = "sample")

obj.list <- lapply(X = obj.list, FUN = function(x) {
    x <- NormalizeData(x)
    x <- FindVariableFeatures(x, selection.method = "vst", nfeatures = 3000)
})

features <- SelectIntegrationFeatures(object.list = obj.list)

```


```{r}

obj.anchors <- FindIntegrationAnchors(object.list = obj.list, anchor.features = features)
obj.combined <- IntegrateData(anchorset = obj.anchors)

```


```{r}

DefaultAssay(obj.combined) <- "integrated"

# Run the standard workflow for visualization and clustering
obj.combined <- ScaleData(obj.combined, verbose = FALSE)
obj.combined <- RunPCA(obj.combined, npcs = 30, verbose = FALSE)
obj.combined <- FindNeighbors(obj.combined, dims = 1:30)
obj.combined <- FindClusters(obj.combined, resolution = 1, algorithm = 4, method = "igraph")
obj.combined <- RunUMAP(obj.combined, dims = 1:30, method="umap-learn")

```


```{r}

DimPlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal()
DimPlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", group.by = "sample") + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal()
DimPlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", group.by = "predicted_doublets") + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal()

```


```{r}

FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Csf1r")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # microglia
FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Mog")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # oligodendrocytes
FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Pdgfra")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # OPC
FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Aqp4")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # astrocytes
FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Col1a1")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # VLMC
FeaturePlot(obj.combined, reduction = "umap", features = c("Tek")) + xlim(-15, 15) + ylim(-15, 15) + coord_equal() # endothelial

```


```{r}

SaveH5Seurat(obj.combined, "E:/Opossum_M1/seurat/opossum_m1_nonneuronal_integrated.h5seurat", overwrite = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)

```
